citation: Proclamation under the Nature Conservation Act 2002 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Nature Conservation Act 2002

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 11(2) of the Nature Conservation Act 2002 declare â€“

        (a) the Crown land specified in Part 1 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Apex Point Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (b) the Crown land specified in Part 2 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Bellettes Bay Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (c) the Crown land specified in Part 3 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Boggy Creek Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (d) the Crown land specified in Part 4 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Long Bay Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (e) the Crown land specified in Part 5 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Norfolk Bay Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (f) the Crown land specified in Part 6 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Norfolk Bay Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (g) the Crown land specified in Part 7 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name North George River Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (h) the Crown land specified in Part 8 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name North West Head Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (i) the Crown land specified in Part 9 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Outer North Head Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (j) the Crown land specified in Part 10 of Schedule 1 to this proclamation to be reserved land in the class of conservation area and give the name Point Du Ressac Conservation Area to that reserved land; and
        (k) that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
3 December 2012

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRIAN WIGHTMAN

Minister for Environment, Parks and Heritage

SCHEDULE 1 - Areas of Land

PART 1 - Apex Point Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 24.43 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 6976 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 1 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 2 - Bellettes Bay Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 128.6 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 6950 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 2 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 3 - Boggy Creek Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 84.24 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7714 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 3 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 4 - Long Bay Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 22.44 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7270 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 4 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 5 - Norfolk Bay Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 200.9 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7007 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 5 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 6 - Norfolk Bay Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 62.6 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7170 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 6 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 7 - North George River Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 14.26 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7751 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 7 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 8 - North West Head Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 43.12 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7008 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 8 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 9 - Outer North Head Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 122.3 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7010 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 9 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

PART 10 - Point Du Ressac Conservation Area

All that area of land comprising about 34.04 hectares, shown as Lot 1 and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 6942 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Part 10 of Schedule 2 to this proclamation.

SCHEDULE 2 - Conservation Areas

PART 1 - Apex Point Conservation Area

PART 2 - Bellettes Bay Conservation Area

PART 3 - Boggy Creek Conservation Area

PART 4 - Long Bay Conservation Area

PART 5 - Norfolk Bay Conservation Area

PART 6 - Norfolk Bay Conservation Area

PART 7 - North George River Conservation Area

PART 8 - North West Head Conservation Area

PART 9 - Outer North Head Conservation Area

PART 10 - Point Du Ressac Conservation Area

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 12 December 2012

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
